articles.author: Science X staff
articles.title: Europe, Japan probes to get 1st look at destination Mercury - Phys.org
articles.description: A joint European-Japanese spacecraft is set to fly by Mercury for the first time late Friday on its path to deliver two probes into the planet's orbit in 2025.
articles.content:
A joint European-Japanese spacecraft is set to fly by Mercury for the first time late Friday on its path to deliver two probes into the planet's orbit in 2025.
The BepiColombo mission will make the … [+1247 chars]
